Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the busyness of the Providence fire department by stating that it is one of the busiest for its relative size in the country.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the source cited by the union president, Firehouse Magazine, does not include data for Providence in its latest available online data.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the busyness of the Providence fire department, such as population density or other factors not mentioned in the provided information.
